name: Lost (itch) (VIDREG)
description:
You are in a remote village, where there is no one. Your car broke down, so you have to find another car, find all the necessary items and leave. You never know what can happen if you stay late.

WASD-movement

E-interaction

Shift-acceleration

Alt+F4-Exit (If you can't complete the game)

At the gate where the car is parked, there is an obelisk that gives a hint.
